Definition.Text: The RAP-VMAT 8 Gy in 1# protocol. Note that there is a distinct cranial-specific option per the RAP-VMAT
The PTV is the GTV with a 1 cm isotropic margin. Differences, e.g. due to use of a CTV, should be documented in the PAN.
The gross tumour volume. If a CTV has been created instead, DO NOT map the CTV to this structure as it is used to create the Lungs_sub_GTV volume.
The entire spinal canal volume. Do not map a PRV structure to this as a 5 mm PRV will be added automatically for optimization
